version_description:
QuartzClock 2.6

V2.6 is a maintenance update that introduces better iOS 7 appearance. Because of its common use as a bedside clock, we have kept to a black interface design as far as iOS 7 allows.

v2.6 also stops a long-running and subt

We've squished a subtle, sneaky bug. New users were unable to set an alarm, because of some permission settings in iOS 8 and newer systems. But thanks to a bug report from a user, we discovered and fixed the problem.

We have also taken the chance
